Articles.Content: So a bit ago I was watching the film Serenity on Netflix, and when I saw the re-entry scene where the primary buffer panel flies off I thought to myself "That is so Kerbal Space Program". Anyway to make a long story short, I went and built a Serenity in KSP and did my best to recreate the scene. By the way, I know my camera work is fairly bad but it is my first time doing something like this.
I don't why, but hearing that scene in kerbal voices made it stupidly hilarious. Rep for you.

Com'on ! Now, i want to see the show again... And the movie too !

but this video is realy cool !
If it means that you watch the show and movie again, then this video has done some good in the world. Firefly is awesome and will forever be shiny.
